item.title: Profiling and benchmarking tools for Applications
item.description: Introduction We develop a piece of software with aim to fulfil specific business requirements in terms of resource usage, throughput etc. In addition to testing, Profiling and benchmarking are approaches that developer has in his/her arsenal in this regard. Lets look at what they mean, Profiling is defined as process aimed at understanding the behavior of a program. A profile result might be a table of time taken per function, as per this and this) Benchmarking measures the time for some whole operation.
